tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE press_release_sentiment (
    press_release_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY,
    sentiment_score FLOAT,
    trading_strategy VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE PressReleases (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    date_published DATE,
    content TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE SentimentAnalysis (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    press_release_id UUID REFERENCES PressReleases(id),
    sentiment_score FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE TradingStrategies (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    strategy_name VARCHAR(255),
    description TEXT,
    recommended_trades TEXT
)
CREATE TABLE press_releases (id INT PRIMARY KEY, title VARCHAR(255), content TEXT, release_date TIMESTAMP, sentiment_score FLOAT)
